title: The boke of nurtur for men seruauntes, and children with Stans puer ad mensam, newelye corrected, verye vtyle and necessarye vnto all youth.
author: Rhodes, Hugh, fl. 1550.
publicationStmtPublisher: Imprinted by me Thomas Colwell: dwellynge in the house of Robert Wyer, beside Charing Crosse,
